mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yuangong_id as yuangongId ,a.kehu_name as kehuName ,a.kehu_phone as kehuPhone ,a.kehu_id_number as kehuIdNumber ,a.kehu_photo as kehuPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.kehu_email as kehuEmail ,a.kehu_jifen_number as kehuJifenNumber ,a.kehu_content as kehuContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yuangong.yuangong_name as yuangongName ,yuangong.yuangong_phone as yuangongPhone ,yuangong.yuangong_id_number as yuangongIdNumber ,yuangong.yuangong_photo as yuangongPhoto ,yuangong.yuangong_email as yuangongEmail ,yuangong.jinyong_types as jinyongTypes
FROM kehu a left JOIN yuangong yuangong ON a.yuangong_id = yuangong.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yuangong_id = #{params.yuangongId} )
and a.kehu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuName},'%')
and a.kehu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuPhone},'%')
and a.kehu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.kehu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuEmail},'%')
and a.kehu_jifen_number >= #{params.kehuJifenNumberStart}
and a.kehu_jifen_number <= #{params.kehuJifenNumberEnd}
and a.kehu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yuangong_id IS NOT NULL
and yuangong.yuangong_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongName},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongPhone},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongIdNumber},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongEmail},'%')
and yuangong.jinyong_types = #{params.jinyongTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
